column4: hello, I'm having problems with my wirelesss, I've seemed to narrow it down to 10.10 and can't seem to get past that.  by any chance did 10.10 remove support for the rtl8180 chipset?
or could anyone give me a hand?  I've been trying everything
my wireless card can't seem to see my network
if the kernel changed, then you need to find which module was taken out (this is the hard part - google/ask around)
